issue.title: [Python] arrow_to_pandas.cc has separate code paths for populating list<T> values into an object array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6471](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6471). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See patch for ARROW-6369 https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5301. There are two different code paths for writing list<T> values into a `PyObject**` output buffer. This seems like it could be simplified
